ComicInfo.Series: The Outer Space Adventures of Blakbone
ComicInfo.Summary:
Blakbone has been kidnapped by a Gray Alien and Bigfoot. He’s not too happy about this until he finds out they are bringing him to face one of his old enemies causing all kinds of trouble in outer space.
Blakbone is your favorite Rock n’ Roll demon from Hell. He’s escaped and, though all he wants is to conquer the world with his band of zombies, always finds himself thrown into some misadventure.
